data.text:
Hi Strawberry!
Everyting ok?

No, I'm feeling sick
Can you spare some coins?

choice.text: choise2 gsdffds dsf dsfdfs fdsdsffd fdsfdsfsd

data.text:
Hi pirate. Are you ready to
go on an adventure!?

No, I'm just collecting
those free coins that
are lying around here.

You know, there is more
to live then coins.

Climb my branches, and discover
what it's all about.

I don't know,
Isn't that dangerous...

Sigh... The are also
coins in the branches.

Why didn't you tell me that earlier
I'm on my way!
Goodmorning little child.
Those where some nice jumps!
Hi, Are you...
Are you God?
Noooo, my child!
I am the man in the sky!

Every year, I bring
presents to the children!
If they are good, that is.
Do you want to have a present?

choice.text:
I'm not a child, but sure,
I like presents!

No time old man, I'm here to
collect the coins..

data.text: Good my child! Choose wisely
Ow...
I think you will regret this!

A lightning strike!
It doesn't have many uses.

An empty box
With a ribbon warped around it.

A non-disclosure agreement.
How exiting!

A toy hamer
You can't realy use that
Hi Cookie, you won't believe who I just met!
Hi Cookie, want to the striking thing I just got?
Hi Cookie, Want to sign my NDA?
Hi Cookie, I got a new hammer!
Hi Cookie, do you want to check out my new box?
Fuck off man!
Sorry. Why are you always so angry?

I don't know?
My mom told me
I was a happy baby.

But then I had to go to
school and stuff.

Now I just want to smash things.
You should try it! It helps
